/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, forming a complex web against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, showcasing the city's architectural diversity and vibrant street culture.
